new cascade Convolutional Neural Network.from sentence: In contrast , we propose a new cascade Convolutional Neural Network that is trained end - to - end .

to make.from sentence: Therefore , we propose a region - of - interest ( ROI ) convolution scheme to make the run-time of the Supervised Transformer Network to be more efficient .

conventional boosting cascade.from sentence:
It first uses a conventional boosting cascade to obtain a set of face candidate areas .
Then , we combine these regions into irregular binary ROI mask .

first stage.from sentence: The first stage is a multi-task Region Proposal Network ( RPN ) , which simultaneously proposes candidate face regions along with associated facial landmarks .

calculated on.from sentence: Different from Li et al. , this network is calculated on the original resolution to better leverage more discriminative information .

aligned candidate face region.from sentence: The aligned candidate face region is then fed into the second - stage network , a RCNN , for further verification .

All DNN operations.from sentence: All DNN operations ( including convolution , ReLU , pooling , and concatenation ) are all processed inside the ROI mask , and hence significantly reduce the computation .

jointly conduct.from sentence: Inspired by Chen et al. , we jointly conduct face detection and face alignment , since face alignment is helpful to distinguish faces / non - faces patterns .

K face candidate regions.from sentence: Note we only keep the K face candidate regions with top responses in a local neighborhood from the RPN .

concatenate.from sentence: We concatenate the feature maps from the two cascaded networks together to form an architecture that is trained end - to - end , as shown in .

jointly defines.from sentence: Note that the canonical positions of the facial landmarks in the aligned face image and the predicted facial landmarks in the candidate face region jointly defines the transform from the candidate face region .

end - to - end training.from sentence: In the end - to - end training , the training of the first - stage RPN to predict facial landmarks is also supervised by annotated facial landmarks in each true face regions .

call.from sentence: We hence call our network a Supervised Transformer Network .
